metadata.title: CVE-2012-6712 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 3.4, a buffer overflow occurs indrivers/net/wireless/iwlwifi/iwl-agn-sta.c, which will cause at leastmemory corruption.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
